title: Colby Simmons Went Straight from DEVO to Flanders in a Wild Few Weeks. Up Next? Paris-Roubaix
content:
Imagine your first WorldTour race being the Tour of Flanders: That just happened to American rookie pro cyclist Colby Simmons.

Read the full article at Colby Simmons Went Straight from DEVO to Flanders in a Wild Few Weeks. Up Next? Paris-Roubaix on Velo.
author: ahood
